creditline: Gift of the Joseph F. McCrindle Collection
description: 2 figures at center - one wearing blue, the other wearing red; view inside a barrel-vaulted structure with 6 arched openings at R; foliage in crevices; sketchy style
medium: Pen and watercolor over black chalk
provenance: Sale, Sotheby's, London, October 10, 1974, no. 370; [Brian Sewell, London, 1978; sold July 1978, for Â£140, to McCrindle,]; Joseph McCrindle, New York (1978-d.2008); Joseph F. McCrindle Foundation (2008-2009; gave to MIA)
title: Interior of a Roman Edifice with Visitors
